body: Hey guys, with the 1.8 update, how long will it take for Avicus to update and more importantly when will we be able to play again?
body_tagged: Hey guys, with the 1.8 update, how long will it take for Avicus to update and more importantly when will we be able to play again?
title: When Will We Be Back Up?

replies.body: Avicus isn't updated at the same day of the release -.- The plugins have to be updated, and the server selves. in 2-3 it will be updated, I would say it's then for 30 min offline, not more :D
replies.body_tagged: Avicus isn't updated at the same day of the release -.- The plugins have to be updated, and the server selves. in 2-3 it will be updated, I would say it's then for 30 min offline, not more :D

replies.body:
oh really? damn! thats great, i was looking ahead at like 3 or 4 days :O
Thanks for that :)
replies.body_tagged:
oh really? damn! thats great, i was looking ahead at like 3 or 4 days :O
Thanks for that :)

reply_to.body: Avicus isn't updated at the same day of the release -.- The plugins have to be updated, and the server selves. in 2-3 it will be updated, I would say it's then for 30 min offline, not more :D

replies.body: It'll be a while. Bukkit isn't ready, we have to fix up all the core plugins and other developers need to update their plugins. So expect delays. Just use 1.7
replies.body_tagged: It'll be a while. Bukkit isn't ready, we have to fix up all the core plugins and other developers need to update their plugins. So expect delays. Just use 1.7

replies.body:
The EULA (which Mojang still won't enforce ._.), the 1.8 Update and people saying we need to have a tourney...

Oh, the coding and changes involved with this.

replies.body: hang on a second, how do you use 1.7? how do you change from 1.8 back to 1.7?
replies.body_tagged: hang on a second, how do you use 1.7? how do you change from 1.8 back to 1.7?

replies.body: In the bottom left corner of your launcher, go to edit profile, then change the Minecraft version to 1.7, instead of "use latest version".
replies.body_tagged: In the bottom left corner of your launcher, go to edit profile, then change the Minecraft version to 1.7, instead of "use latest version".

reply_to.body: In the bottom left corner of your launcher, go to edit profile, then change the Minecraft version to 1.7, instead of "use latest version".
reply_to.body_tagged: In the bottom left corner of your launcher, go to edit profile, then change the Minecraft version to 1.7, instead of "use latest version".
